author: rdonkin
msg: JAMES-1231 Reports not working correctly, so strip back to basics.

author: stefan2
msg: Make membuffer cache segmentation dynamic, i.e. don't segment
smaller caches. That will allow for much larger objects to be cached
Remember: max cachable item size = cache size / (4 * #segments)

msg: JAMES-1231 Removed version to free a little space.
